mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, user_no, regdate, attachment) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userNo}, CURDATE(), #{attachment})
mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.user_no, b.regdate, b.attachment, u.email, u.name, u.attachment as "uattachment" FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no AND b.no = #{no} ORDER BY b.no DESC;
